title: Contact a support agent
content:
üìå Note: Live chat support agents are currently only available for the US market. For non-US market support, please [submit a ticket](6661ee49ea792702c925ff02) instead. In the Partner Center Console, navigate to the **Help Center** located at the bottom of the left-hand navigation panel: ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/aa7a35d5a8d945af9ef1ad5a5bc6dea8~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) # For TikTok Shop Partners (TSPs) As a TSP, you may contact support on behalf of a seller. In the **Help Center**, select the option to **Get support for a shop**: ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/a12d5b6d2c734a62ae3d9885a5ad0ab7~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) You will be prompted with the following set of drop-down menus: ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/250aa39e3e8847e8b29b1b2ffebda63f~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) 1. For **Target Market**, select the United States. 2. For **Service**, select your correct TSP service. 3. For **Shop ID**, select the correct seller from the drop-down menu, or manually input the corresponding Shop ID. ‚ùó Important: If you can't find the correct Shop ID, the shop has most likely not authorized you to contact support on their behalf. Please visit the [FAQs - How can a seller authorize a TSP to contact support](66688ae10664fe02c1da888e#FAQs) at the bottom of this guide. 4. Select **Start Chat** 5. A new chat window will open to connect with a seller support agent:
# For Creator Agency Partners (CAPs)/Multi-Channel Networks (MCNs) In the **Help Center**, select the option to **Get support for a creator**: ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/c6a4e38d6da249b9b81d44d68a01665c~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) You will be prompted with the follow set of drop-down menus: ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/97f474ecbe054e85bd589e8cb1914d37~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) 1. For **Target Market**, select the United States. 2. For **Creator** **Username**, select the correct creator. 3. Select **Start Chat**. 4. A new chat window will open to connect with a creator support agent: ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/2e244a79acdc45fdafdf33673a5bd023~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) # FAQs ## How can a seller authorize a TSP to contact support on their behalf? 1. The TSP should navigate to **Partner Center** > **Apps and Services** > **Copy authorization link**: ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/178b708a02d845649777fca017123a28~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) 2. Send the authorization link to the seller. If they are a new seller, ensure they check the box to **Submit a ticket for me** during authorization: ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/abf49e7a78f749949c8f5f80eaa8f578~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) Existing sellers will be presented with an authorization renewal prompt, where they will be able to check the same box to **Submit a ticket for me**: ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/2b71bae619134851929f8bc23f3c36f5~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
